nodes.text: Tagta the Hutt was a member of the Desilijic clan. He was cousin to, and subordinate of, Jiliac
Tagta had his palace located on the cold planet Nar Hekka, in the farther reaches of the Y'Toub system.
He was responsible for referring Han Solo to Jiliac and Jabba in 5 BBY, after Han successfully transferred a ship with lucrative cargo from Devaron to Nar Hekka.
